description:
Looking up at the towering Metropolitan Government Office, businesswoman Mai sighs. With hesitant steps, she enters the building.  Meanwhile, inside the Miracle Train, Tocho is worried about the time, saying their next passenger is late. Leaving Tocho to worry by himself, the other stations find ways to pass the time. Mai finally gets on at the Tocho-mae station, but claims to have solved her problem herself already.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パスポートをあなたに
